main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Sebring, Florida, on February 6, 1960.
interesting points: The object appeared disc-shaped and flickered like a headlight,It was under intelligent control as it changed direction rapidly,Several witnesses, including the observer's neighbor, confirmed the sighting,The object was very bright and changed colors as it moved,The observation lasted for approximately 1.5 minutes.
witness description: local residents, including the observer and a neighbor
